users.bio: I think every chef, not just in America, but across the world, has a double-edged sword - two jackets, one that's driven, a self-confessed perfectionist, thoroughbred, hate incompetence and switch off the stove, take off the jacket and become a family man.
I am a fresh person, I like fresh things, although I will say its not always a salad. In fact it's never a salad! Salad's are sad I only like meat. I guess that makes me a true carnivore!

recipes.name: Grilled Steak Spicy Marinade
recipes.ingredients: (1)Tomahawk Ribeye, (6oz) of Texas BBQ Sauce, (5tbs.) Wisticher, (2tbs.) Red Pepper Flakes

recipes.name: Imperial Beer Bread
recipes.ingredients: (12oz) Imperial Stout, (1 Stick) Unsalted Butter, (2Cups) All Purpose Flower, (2tbs.) Brown Sugar.

recipes.name: Beef Stew
recipes.ingredients: (2L) Beef Broth, (12oz) Cubed Steak, (14oz) Raw Human Emotion

recipeBooks.name: Michael's Good Time Summer Recipe Book
This one is for the boys.
